name: 9Grids VR
summary:
9 Grids VR is an arcade-style, fast-paced, short and easy fun game for the HTC Vive that is a combination of whack a mole and dodgeball in a apocalyptic world.

Slash or blast up your enemies and dodge their attacks by moving physically around the unique 9 Grids movement system!
Choose from a variety of weapons, from sword to hammer and more. Unlock different stages, worlds and abilities.

name: 9-gatsu no Yoru ni Tsume Shogi
summary: 9-gatsu no Yoru ni Tsume Shogi is a version for Satellaview of Super Tsume Shougi which distributed different challenges in the nights of September in 1997.

name: 9 Games, 2 Buttons
summary: In this game you play up to 9 minigames at the same time, at game speeds of 50-300%. You use the numberpad and QWE down, which match where the minigame is on the grid. Push for a new high score, trash talk your friends!
